description: A Computer Game by Mike Klubnika

v0.0.1.description:
## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
    
## Changelog

- **Items**
    - Added consumable items
    - Added Double or Nothing pills
    - Added filler items

- **Locations**
    - Added round completion locations
    - Added achievement locations
    - Added shotsanity locations

- **Client**
    - Initial release

## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.0.1.title: APBuckshot 0.0.1

v0.0.2.description:
**Hotfix 1 (1/7/2026):** Shotsanity counts are now properly set when reconnecting to Archipelago. This does not affect the AP World.

## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
## Changelog
### World
- Fixed numerous generation errors primarily involving restrictive starts or a 70K goal.
- Fixed logic for Double or Nothing round locations with `goal` set to `"custom"`.
- Fixed access rules for the following achievements, which would previously be marked as unable to reach:
    - Nope!
    - 140K
    - 1000K
    - Know When to Quit
### Client
- Added an overlay during gameplay that displays the server connection status
- Connection status now properly updates upon failing to connect
- Fixed connection info text fields not accepting backspaces
- Fixed connection failure to locally hosted Archipelago servers
- Fixed Double or Nothing mode unlocking upon beating the base game regardless of user options
## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup & Updating](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.0.2.title: APBuckshot 0.0.2

v0.0.3r2.description:
**Hotfix 1 (1/15/2026):** Fixed KeyError during generation when attempting to generate a game where custom goal amount is set to ≤70000 and achievements are disabled. This does not affect the client.

## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
## Changelog
### World
- Fixed bug where an extra filler item would be added to the item pool
### Client
- Added an in-game item tracker
    - Press **TAB** while in-game to open the tracker
    - Hover over an icon to display the item name, model, and collection status
- Added a sound effect that plays when you fail to roll an item
- Added a version label in the main menu
## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup & Updating](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.0.3r2.title: APBuckshot 0.0.3

v0.1.0.description:
## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
- **Custom Mechanics**
    - Unique gameplay features specific to the Archipelago world
## Changelog
### World
#### Custom Mechanics
- Added items/options for custom mechanics, aimed to make the game more sync-friendly.
    - **Item Luck**: Increase the likelihood of pulling an item
    - **Life Bank**: Spend charges from your life bank to replenish your health
#### Traps
- Added traps and trap-related options
    - **Stolen Package Trap**: The box will be empty the next time items are drawn
    - **Schrodinger's Bullet Trap**: The loaded shell is randomized right before you shoot
#### Other
- Added **Death Link**
- Merged live and blank shotsanity
- Changed default shotsanity option to *"balanced"*
- Clarified documentation about shotsanity in the player YAML
### Client
#### Custom Mechanics
- Added functionality
- Added info to the tracker displaying the current tier of item luck
    - Accessible by opening the tracker and not hovering over an item
- Added Life Bank UI
    - Accessible by clicking on the lightning bolt near the top-left of the screen
    - Visible only after first obtaining a *Life Bank Charge* item from the multiworld
#### Traps
- Added functionality
- Added indicators to the bottom left of the screen displaying which traps are active
#### Other
- Added **Death Link** functionality
    - When you lose all your health, you will send a death link.
    - When receiving a death link, you will be killed by the dealer on your next turn.
    - An indicator is visible if you are awaiting a death link.
- Changed the in-game Archipelago connection fields to be persistent after the menu is closed and reopened
## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup & Updating](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.1.0.title: APBuckshot 0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
**Hotfix 1 (2/15/2026):** Greatly increased the inbound buffer size of the web socket, allowing you to connect to large rooms without dropping packets.

## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
- **Custom Mechanics**
    - Unique gameplay features specific to the Archipelago world
## Changelog
### World
- Added an error message when attempting to generate a single-player world with tight logic and few locations (no achievements or shotsanity)
### Client
- Added new functionality to Progressive Item Luck
    - Progressive Item Luck now decreases the chance of the dealer drawing an item by 10% per tier (Up to a max of 30%)
- Added new functionality to the Life Bank
    - If you have charges in your Life Bank when getting death linked, you will be set to 1 hp instead of dying (and a charge will be used)
- Added notifications when receiving an item
- Added error notifications when connecting to a game
- Changed the death link dialogue to an explanation for the cause of death
- Fixed issue where the overlay and tracker would not unload when winning the game
- Fixed issue where the player could interact with items or grab the shotgun during a death link
- Fixed issue where using the Life Bank or tracker in the main menu or in heaven crashes the game
- Fixed issue where the 'Cash Out' location wouldn't send, making 1000k and custom goals now possible without manual intervention
## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup & Updating](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.1.1.title: APBuckshot 0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
**Hotfix 1 (2/21/2026):** Actually/hopefully fixed crash during item drawing, which occurred due to a bug where the dealer could draw more items than they should have been able to.

## Features
- **Consumable Item Randomization**
    - Item unlocks are shuffled randomly
- **Steam Achievements**
    - Obtain items from completing achievements
- **Shotsanity**
    - Obtain items from successful shots
- **Customizable Goal**
    - Choose from one of the following goals:
        - **70K**: Beat the game
        - **140K**: Beat 6 Double or Nothing rounds in a row
        - **1000K**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a score of at least 1 million
        - **Custom**: Cash out in Double or Nothing mode with a user-specified minimum score
- **Consumable Item Logic**
    - Customize how many consumable are expected to beat a certain number of rounds
- **Custom Mechanics**
    - Unique gameplay features specific to the Archipelago world
## Changelog
### World
- Added proper logic for the *Cash Out* location
- Removed error message when attempting to generate a single-player world with tight logic and few locations (no achievements or shotsanity). It should just generate now when using those options.
### Client
- Checking *Chasing Losses* now also checks *Overdose*
- Re-added Multiplayer button to the main menu
    - The mod does not affect multiplayer (yet)
## Guides
- [Info](<https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/en_Buckshot Roulette.md>)
- [Setup & Updating](https://github.com/asdfwyay/APBuckshot/blob/dev/worlds/buckshot/docs/setup_en.md)
v0.1.2.title: APBuckshot 0.1.2
